testcase.classname: To test the login functionality of shopping aaplication.
testcase.name: Test login functionality for valid username and password.
testcase.system-out: Given Setup browser driver and navigate to the home page....................passed When Verify the tittle is homepage..........................................passed Then Select login option....................................................passed Then Enter valid "monish@gmail.com" and "user"..............................passed Then Click on sign in button................................................passed And Verify dashboard........................................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
